name: spaceTime.γ5
declaration:

def spaceTime.γ5  : Matrix (Fin 4) (Fin 4) ℂ

name: spaceTime.γ1
declaration:
/-- The γ¹ gamma matrix in the Dirac representation. -/
def spaceTime.γ1  : Matrix (Fin 4) (Fin 4) ℂ

name: spaceTime.γ2
declaration:
/-- The γ² gamma matrix in the Dirac representation. -/
def spaceTime.γ2  : Matrix (Fin 4) (Fin 4) ℂ

name: spaceTime.γ.γ_in_γSet
declaration: theorem spaceTime.γ.γ_in_γSet (μ : Fin 4) : spaceTime.γ μ ∈ spaceTime.γ.γSet

name: spaceTime.γ
declaration:
/-- The γ gamma matrices in the Dirac representation. -/
def spaceTime.γ  : Fin 4 → Matrix (Fin 4) (Fin 4) ℂ

name: spaceTime.γ.γSet
spaceTime.γ3
declaration:
/-- The γ³ gamma matrix in the Dirac representation. -/
def spaceTime.γ3  : Matrix (Fin 4) (Fin 4) ℂ

name: spaceTime.γ.γ_in_diracAlgebra
declaration: theorem spaceTime.γ.γ_in_diracAlgebra (μ : Fin 4) : spaceTime.γ μ ∈ spaceTime.γ.diracAlgebra

name: spaceTime.γ.diracAlgebra
declaration:
/-- The algebra generated by the gamma matrices in the Dirac representation. -/
def spaceTime.γ.diracAlgebra  : Subalgebra ℝ (Matrix (Fin 4) (Fin 4) ℂ)

name: spaceTime.γ0
